title: Lost all my Levels after re-instsalling the game due to update LoL glitch
body: I was on level 18 yesterday, frustratingly after the LoL update 3 days ago, I logged in again and it came up with a new username of  Nowayboi (never heard of this name) I am now back at level one, Nowayboi is not my username and I don't know how to get my name and level back. Please help me!

replies.body: You're likely logging into the wrong account. The account 'NowayBoi' was just recently created last year and hasn't actually ever played a game. Please reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can help you track down your other level 18 account!
